publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2921.3 Jim Hume: A Fresh Start for Scottish Aquacultureâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-2921) in the name of Michael Russell, insert at end "believes that Scotland can learn valuable lessons from its competitor nations with thriving aquaculture industries; further believes that Scottish aquaculture can maximise the opportunities presented by the current rapid expansion of the international industry to achieve genuinely sustainable growth, and therefore calls on the Scottish Government to take decisive action to streamline the regulatory burden, introduce a fair inspection regime, improve community and industry liaison, and encourage the development and retention of a skilled and qualified workforce in the aquaculture industry."
